评论概述: Great for travel, not for heavy duty
评论详情: As others have said, these aren't terribly sturdy pants.  They're fine for everyday use, but not for things like construction work.  What they're really, really good for is traveling.  Lots of pockets makes it easy to have everything you need on you without having to fish for and through a bag, and the elastic waist won't dig into you when you have to sit down for long periods like a flight or road trip.

评论概述: Very nice casual pants with useful pockets
评论详情: First a request to all clothing manufacturers.  Please make cloths with suitable pockets that will accomodate a phone.  We all carry our phones with us and need to have a safe handy place to store them.  The back pocket of jeans is not that place.  You don't want to sit on your phone nor is it a safe place.  It can fall out or be taken easily.  Come up with a better idea!  This not only applies to jeans but also jackets.  Create custom pockets for phones, please.  I recently purhased a very nice hoodie jacket but there is no accomodation for a phone and the pockets are useless for any item--case in point.Now in regards to thes pants and I purchased two of them in different colors.  They have very good pockets and the two large front ones work great for carrying a phone.  The pants are light, fit well for me  with a 37 waist and the length is just right, about 30/31.  They are of relatively light weight material which is what I like to wear year round.

评论概述: Regretful Purchase; tossing in trash can

Not perma-press.  I wish this design was on a better quality pair of pants (elastic waistband, zippered fly, and cargo pockets).  These pants were shipped from an overseas Asian market, which explains the long delay in getting them to me.  Overall, this was a waste of money.  I do not recommend.
